nodes.text: The Scarif Deployment, also known as the Scarif garrison, was a garrison of the Imperial Army. It defended the Imperial security complex on Scarif, and was headquartered in the Citadel Tower. Making up its numbers were stormtroopers and coastal defender stormtroopers.  It operated in tandem with Orbital Command, the naval presence around the planet. On Scarif during the Imperial Era, the Army garrison was maintained alongside the garrison of the Imperial Navy's Military Police, a military law enforcement corps that made use of shore patrol officers. Captain TK-32028 served in the Scarif Deployment. General Sotorus Ramda was the deployment's commanding officer.
